subtitleNullable: A Novel Turkish COVID-19 Twitter Dataset for Sentiment Analysis
descriptionNullable: This novel dataset was constructed for the implementation of my study titled "*A Novel COVID-19 Sentiment Analysis in Turkish based on the Combination of Convolutional Neural Network and Bidirectional Long-Short Term Memory on Twitter*", which was published in [Concurrency and Computation: Practice and Experience, Volume: 34, Issue: 22, DOI: 10.1002/cpe.6883](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1002/cpe.6883). Please cite this paper in case you use this dataset.
title: Turkish COVID-19 Twitter Dataset
subtitle: A Novel Turkish COVID-19 Twitter Dataset for Sentiment Analysis
description: This novel dataset was constructed for the implementation of my study titled "*A Novel COVID-19 Sentiment Analysis in Turkish based on the Combination of Convolutional Neural Network and Bidirectional Long-Short Term Memory on Twitter*", which was published in [Concurrency and Computation: Practice and Experience, Volume: 34, Issue: 22, DOI: 10.1002/cpe.6883](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1002/cpe.6883).
